exceptions.exn: In environment A : (R -> Prop) -> Prop x0 : ?T Unable to unify "(fix Tn (n : nat) (T : Type) {struct n} : Type := match n with | 0%nat => unit | S n0 => (T * Tn n0 T)%type end) ?m (Tn ?n ?T)" with "forall eps : posreal, exists x : R, A (ball x eps)".
The LHS of plus_opp_r (plus _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros A. unfold Mplus. unfold Mopp. unfold Mzero. apply coeff_mat_ext. intros i j. rewrite plus_opp_r. reflexivity.
